Uses of Class
org.codemonkey.swiftsocketserver.ClientContext

Packages that use ClientContext
org.codemonkey.swiftsocketserver Provides the classes to create a TCP / UDP socket server that communicates using custom serialized Java messages objects. 
 

Uses of ClientContext in org.codemonkey.swiftsocketserver

private  Map<ClientContext,ClientHandler> SwiftSocketServer.clientHandlers
